{docbook}
<abstract>
 <para>This chapter provides you with the basic knowledge of overridden components, internal APIs implemented in Knowledge. Also,
you will know how to set up a default template for the FAQ portlet, and how to create a sample action extension in Wiki.</para>
<para>In this chapter, there are the following main topics:</para>
    <itemizedlist>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="KSref.DeveloperReference.ExtensionPoints">Extension points</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Details of configuration plug-in and tutorial of ForumEventLifeCycle, AnswerEventLifeCycle and BBCodeRenderer.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="KSref.DeveloperReference.InternalAPI">Internal API</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Description of REST Services of internal APIs which the Knowledge applications (Forum, Answers and Polls) use to communicate with the server.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="KSref.DeveloperReference.WikiService">Wiki Service API</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Description of Wiki Service API used in the Knowledge function.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="KSref.DeveloperReference.FAQTemplateConfiguration">FAQ Template Configuration</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Instructions on how to configure the FQA template and to change its look and feel, information of APIs provided by the UIComponent. </para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="KSref.DeveloperReference.Extend_actions_over_a_wiki_page_from_external_jars">Actions over a wiki page from external jars</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Instructions on how to extend your own actions packaged in external jars to the Wiki toolbar via the following particular topics:</para>
		  <itemizedlist>
			 <listitem>
				<para>
				Create a new project for action extension
				</para>
			 </listitem>
			 <listitem>
				<para>
				Create new actions and their corresponding listeners
				</para>
			 </listitem>
			 <listitem>
				<para>
				Register new actions with UIExtensionManager
				</para>
			 </listitem>
			 <listitem>
				<para>
				Deploy new action extension
				</para>
			 </listitem>
		  </itemizedlist>
      </listitem>
       <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="KSref.JCRStructure">JCR structure</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Description of the JCR structure of the main Knowledge applications, including Forum, FAQ, Poll and Wiki. </para>
      </listitem>
    </itemizedlist>
	</abstract>
{docbook}
